trans-unit.source: Represents the HTML <see langword="scope" /> attribute for classes that represent header cells in a table.
trans-unit.target: 表示某些类的 HTML <see langword="scope" /> 特性，这些类表示表中的标头单元格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope> enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell> classes to represent the scope of the header cell when it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope>枚举由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell>类表示的标题单元格的作用域，则在呈现时。

trans-unit.source: The default `Scope` property for both of these classes is the NotSet value, in which case no HTML `scope` attribute is written for the header cell.
trans-unit.target: 默认值`Scope`为两个类的属性为 NotSet 值，在此情况下没有 HTML`scope`属性专为标题单元格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell.Scope%2A> property is used to make HTML tables more accessible by providing information about relationships between the cells and the headers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell.Scope%2A>属性用于使 HTML 表更易于访问通过提供有关单元格和标头之间的关系的信息。

trans-unit.source: The object that represents a header cell of a table is rendered with the <see langword="scope" /> attribute set to <c>"Column"</c>.
trans-unit.target: 呈现表示表标头单元格的对象，并将 <see langword="scope" /> 属性设置为 <c>"Column"</c>。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="scope" /> attribute is not rendered for the header cell.
trans-unit.target: 不呈现标头单元格的 <see langword="scope" /> 特性。

trans-unit.source: The object that represents a header cell of a table is rendered with the <see langword="scope" /> attribute set to <c>"Row"</c>.
trans-unit.target: 呈现表示表标头单元格的对象，并将 <see langword="scope" /> 属性设置为 <c>"Row"</c>。
